TopicTitle: Mod request to tame the science container "collect all" function

Articles.Content: I suppose others are also annoyed by this... The science containers have a "collect all" function but no way to move particular items out of the container. It's a science black hole. It would be nice to have a mod to remove one item (I'd call it "science popper") but it probably wouldn't be easy to add a button on the science review window. An simpler way would be to add a PAW function to collect science only from sensors and crewed modules - anything that does not have a "collect all" function itself.  Or just modify the stock "collect all" this way. Then there would be zero UI changes. There's already a transfer function, so the stock collect all function isn't needed.
Have you tried working with Ship Manifest? I do believe it does what you want.
I haven't tried it. Looks like Papa Joe has an update coming so I'll wait for that to try it out. Thanks
